main event: Observers in Lakewood, California reported a bright pinpoint of light with a smaller red light at the center on May 5, 1966, which moved at a very rapid speed.
interesting points: The observers noted the object was directly above and moving quickly,There were multiple sightings of bright objects on different occasions in 1966,One witness described a very large round white object that glowed and appeared larger than the moon,Another sighting involved spherical objects that illuminated the sky and hovered before ascending vertically,The witnesses had experience in aeronautics and were uncertain about the nature of the sightings.
sighted object: bright pinpoint of light with a smaller red light at the center
witness description: Civilian male with aeronautical and engineering experience
